messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/30/02 6:15:56 PM Central Standard Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

> <<I know its effect on ME and I'm wildly curious to see if I fit a
> scientific
> study. <g> >>
>
> I believe the general summary was that it was calming.
> I don't know if I saved the article.

I don't know about you, but it gets me all hot, certainly not calm! <g> But
then again, a good evening of fun certainly makes for a good sleep. So maybe
that what it was referring to.

~Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
